short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to right-click on any token on Dexscreener.com to check for potential rug pulls via RugCheck or De.Fi Scanner

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Implements a simple context-menu available via right-click on Dexscreener.com that lets users perform various actions - primarily checking for rug pulls - more easily: rather than visiting the token details page and then copy-pasting token addresses, now one click is enough.

The menu is available via right-click and the current options are:

1) Check Token (for potential rug pulls)
2) Copy token address 
3) Copy token price 
4) Copy token information 
5) Copy token information in CSV format
